Sensors

Class LightSensorColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sensors.LightSensorColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataProvider<java.lang.Float>, SwitchableFilter, TimerInterface

    public class LightSensorColor
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataProvider<java.lang.Float>, TimerInterface, SwitchableFilter
    A class to poll data from the color sensor in a concurrent manner

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TICK_RATE
      Suggested sampling rate for that sensor as an interval in ms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightSensorColor

        public LightSensorColor(EV3ColorSensor pEV3ColorSensor,
                boolean autostart,
                boolean useFilter,
                int window)
        Constructs a light sensor poller with a user defined sampling rate
        Parameters:
        pEV3ColorSensor - An instance of a valid pEV3ColorSensor
        autostart - Start polling automatically or not
        useFilter - Makes the output of the sensor filtered
        window - Window size of the applied filter
